name: Out of Pond
description:
You're a little frog named Hichki! They want to venture out of the pond, but outside the forest-surrounded pond is an unknown world. What could be out there?

🐸🐸🐸

This game is made in 10 days for the Narrative Driven Jam #7!
Thank you so much for the opportunities!

🐸🐸🐸

And big thanks to everyone who worked on this!

Mechanics & Programming: Veera
Writing: Azure_Monk
Art: BT, Azure_Monk
Design: Everyone
Color Palette --> Kerrie Lake
Font --> NoahK
